fr.univrennes1.cri.jtacl.core.network
Class NetworkEquipment

java.lang.Object
  fr.univrennes1.cri.jtacl.core.network.NetworkEquipment
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericEquipment
public class NetworkEquipment
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a network equipment.

A network equipment has a name and is connected to the network by at least one interface Iface

Author:
Patrick Lamaiziere

the path of the file containing the configuration of this equipment.
the format and the reading of this file depend of the implementation.

Constructor Detail

NetworkEquipment

public NetworkEquipment(Monitor monitor,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String comment,
                        java.lang.String configurationFileName)
Create a new NetworkEquipment with this name and this comment.

Parameters:
monitor - the Monitor monitor associated with this equipment.
name - the name of the equipment.
comment - a free comment for this equipment.
configurationFileName - name of the configuration file to use (may be null).
Method Detail

addIface

public Iface addIface(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String comment)
Create a new Iface named name and attach it to this equipment.

Parameters:
name - the name of the Interface. The name of an Iface must be unique in one NetworkEquipment.
comment - a free comment for this interface.
Returns:
the Iface created

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this NetworkEquipment equipment.

Returns:
name of this NetworkEquipment equipment.

getComment

public java.lang.String getComment()
Returns the free comment of this NetworkEquipment equipment.

Returns:
the free comment of this NetworkEquipment equipment.

getConfigurationFileName

public java.lang.String getConfigurationFileName()
Returns the name of the configuration file of this NetworkEquipment.

Returns:
the name of the configuration file (may be null)

getIfaces

public IfacesByName getIfaces()
Returns the Iface interfaces of this NetworkEquipment.

Returns:
a IfacesByName map containing the Iface interfaces. The returned map could be empty but not null.

getIface

public Iface getIface(java.lang.String name)
Returns the Iface named 'name' in this NetworkEquipment.

Parameters:
name - the name of the Iface interface.
Returns:
the Iface with this name. Null if this NetworkEquipment does not contain any interface with this name.

getIfaceLinks

public IfaceLinks getIfaceLinks()
Returns all the IfaceLink links associated to this NetworkEquipment.

Returns:
an IfaceLinks list containing the links. The list could be empty but not null.

getIfaceLink

public IfaceLink getIfaceLink(IPNet ip)
Returns the IfaceLink link with this IPNet IP address in this NetworkEquipment.

Parameters:
ip - the IP address of the IfaceLink link.
Returns:
the IfaceLink with this IP address. Null if this NetworkEquipment does not contain any link with this IP address.

getIfaceConnectedTo

public Iface getIfaceConnectedTo(IPNet ip)
                          throws java.net.UnknownHostException
Returns the Iface directely connected to this IPNet IP address in this NetworkEquipment.

Parameters:
ip - the IP address directely connected to the Iface interface.
Returns:
the Iface directely connected to this IP address. Null if this NetworkEquipment does not contain any interface connected to this IP address.
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - if IP addresses cannot be expressed as network addresses.

configure

public void configure()
Configures this NetworkEquipment equipment.
This method is called by the Monitor monitor when all the NetworkEquipment equipments have been created. This method should be overrided, by example to read the configuration file of the equipment.

incoming

public void incoming(IfaceLink link,
                     Probe probe)
This method is called when a Probe probe is received on this NetworkEquipment equipment.
This method should be overrided.

Parameters:
link - the IfaceLink link from which the probe was received.
probe - the Probe received

outgoing

public void outgoing(IfaceLink link,
                     Probe probe,
                     IPNet nexthop)
Sends a Probe probe on this NetworkEquipment equipment.

Parameters:
link - the IfaceLink link to use.
probe - the Probe to send.
nexthop - the IPNet IP address of the next hop.

getShowableRoutes

public ShowableRoutes getShowableRoutes()
Returns a ShowableRoutes interface. This method must be overrided.

Returns:
a ShowableRoutes interface.
